page.title: 17Railway Station
page.content: Ashford has a big station. You can get to a lot of places quickly. At the station there are two car parks. Altogether there are spaces for about 102 cars. There are places to park motor-bikes and bicycles. There is a taxi office and some taxis are usually waiting outside. Inside there is a ticket office and an information centre with lots of leaflets about cheap tickets and places to visit and a stall selling books and magazines. Ashford station has four platforms where there are two buffets, toilets, waiting rooms and seats. Trains go to London, Folkestone, Dover, Eastbourne, Brighton, Canterbury, Deal, Gatwick and places inbetween. It takes one and a half hours to get to London or Gatwick, 30 minutes to Dover and two and a half hours to Brighton.
